channel.title: First day of 3d modeling Class in school
channel.description:
It was our first lesson in Autodesk Maya.
We had to build our dream world. (To get to know the program) So i tried to make myself a runescape castle on a island, (317) where i could enjoy my 99's
[img]http://gyazo.com/3fa1a6824eec2dc498a44051981cbe03.png?1362608669[/img]
Kinda figured out, how to texture stuff on my own in photoshop. So thats why its so crappy xD

item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“thakillah, post:7, topic:506676”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=624912.msg4278419#msg4278419 date=1365226902]

Reminds me of Super Mario 64 looking at those trees haha

OMFG, same here man, we share soo much in common lmfao.
[/quote]

just because you share one thing in common you can’t say you share much in common :)[/quote]
… (ruined the moment)
OT: i think u should try to add something on the far right side, there is nothing and its empty

item.title: First day of 3d modeling Class in school
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“Carcool, post:3, topic:506676”]omg, nice.

1 question, is it possible to add this and replace old lumbridge?
if so, how?

10/10[/quote]

XD

Well i dont know it 100%

But i guess you have to convert the 3d file to a .dat file.
Then edit the mapdata with this new dat file.

and it should ruin ur client ;D

Read full topic
